    23  type Watch struct {
    24  	Now          time.Time
    25  	ID           int64
    26  	dir0         string
    27  	cleanDir     string
    28  	abs          string
    29  	events       chan *WatchEvent
    30  	errChan      chan error
    31  	watcher      fsnotify.Watcher
    32  	filter       fsnotify.Op
    33  	shutCh       chan struct{}
    34  	ctx          context.Context
    35  	shutdownLock sync.Once
    36  	wgThread     sync.WaitGroup
    37  	isShutdown   parl.AtomicBool
    38  }
    39  
    40  var watchNo int64
    41  
    42  /*
    43  NewWatch produces events from a file-system entry and its child directories.
    44  WatchEvents must be listened for on the .Events() channel until it closes.
    45  Events that can be listened for are WatchOpAll (default: 0) Create Write Remove Rename Chmod.
    46  errors must be listened for on the .Errors() channel until it closes.
    47  Close the watcher by canceling the context or invoking .Shutdown().
    48  
    49  220315 github.com/fsnotify/fsnotify v1.4.9 does not support macOS
    50  220315 use the old github.com/fsnotify/fsevents v0.1.1
    51  */
    52  func NewWatch(directory string, filter fsnotify.Op, ctx context.Context) (watch *Watch) {
    53  
    54  	// listen to file system
    55  	if ctx == nil {
    56  		ctx = context.Background()
    57  	}
    58  	wa := Watch{
    59  		Now:      time.Now(),
    60  		ID:       atomic.AddInt64(&watchNo, 1),
    61  		dir0:     directory,
    62  		cleanDir: filepath.Clean(directory),
    63  		events:   make(chan *WatchEvent),
    64  		errChan:  make(chan error),
    65  		filter:   filter,
    66  		shutCh:   make(chan struct{}),
    67  		ctx:      ctx,
    68  	}
    69  	if abs, err := filepath.Abs(directory); err != nil {
    70  		panic(parl.Errorf("filepath.Abs: %q '%w'", directory, err))
    71  	} else {
    72  		wa.abs = abs
    73  	}
    74  	if err := wa.startWatcher(); err != nil {
    75  		panic(err) // failure setting up directory three watchers
    76  	}
    77  	parl.Info("%s WatchFS directories added\n", parltime.NsLocal(wa.Now))
    78  
    79  	// strat thread emitting event and errors
    80  	wa.wgThread.Add(1)
    81  	go wa.fsnotifyListener()
    82  
    83  	return &wa
    84  }

    99  func (wa *Watch) startWatcher() (err error) {
   100  	var watcher *fsnotify.Watcher
   101  	defer func() {
   102  		if err != nil && watcher != nil {
   103  			if e := wa.watcher.Close(); e != nil {
   104  				err = error116.AppendError(err, parl.Errorf("watcher.Close: %w", e))
   105  			}
   106  		}
   107  	}()
   108  	if watcher, err = fsnotify.NewWatcher(); err != nil {
   109  		return parl.Errorf("fsnotify.NewWatcher: '%w'", err)
   110  	}
   111  	wa.watcher = *watcher
   112  
   113  	return wa.scan()
   114  }
   115  
   116  func (wa *Watch) scan() (err error) {
   117  	// scan Dir for all subdirectories
   118  	// neither Linux and macOS can watch a directory tree so
   119  	// each watched directory needs to be referenced
   120  	var dirs []string
   121  	if dirs, err = Dirs(wa.dir0); err != nil {
   122  		return
   123  	}
   124  	parl.Info("watching: %s\n", parls.QuoteList(dirs))
   125  
   126  	// add directories
   127  	for _, dir := range dirs {
   128  		if err = wa.watcher.Add(dir); err != nil {
   129  			err = parl.Errorf("setWatch Linux watcher.Add: '%w'", err)
   130  			return
   131  		}
   132  	}
   133  	return
   134  }
   135  
   136  func (wa *Watch) fsnotifyListener() {
   137  	var err error
   138  	defer func() {
   139  		wa.wgThread.Done() // this releases .Shutdown()
   140  		wa.Shutdown()      // invoke Shutdown if that has not already happened
   141  		if e := parl.HandlePanic(func() { close(wa.errChan) }); e != nil {
   142  			parl.Log("close err chan: %s", e.Error())
   143  		}
   144  	}()
   145  	defer parl.Recover2(parl.Annotation(), &err, func(e error) { wa.errChan <- e })
   146  	defer func() {
   147  		close(wa.events)
   148  	}()
   149  	defer func() {
   150  		if e := wa.watcher.Close(); e != nil {
   151  			wa.errChan <- parl.Errorf("fsnotify.Watcher.Close: '%w'", e)
   152  		}
   153  	}()
   154  
   155  	for {
   156  		select {
   157  		case inEvent, ok := <-wa.watcher.Events:
   158  			now := time.Now()
   159  			if !ok {
   160  				if !wa.isShutdown.IsTrue() {
   161  					wa.errChan <- parl.Errorf("%s event channel closed", wa.ID)
   162  				}
   163  				break
   164  			}
   165  			parl.Info("%s %s\n", parltime.NsLocal(now), inEvent)
   166  
   167  			// filter
   168  			if wa.filter != WatchOpAll && inEvent.Op&wa.filter == 0 {
   169  				continue
   170  			}
   171  
   172  			// emit
   173  			wa.events <- &WatchEvent{
   174  				At:        now,
   175  				ID:        uuid.New(),
   176  				BaseName:  filepath.Base(inEvent.Name),
   177  				AbsName:   filepath.Join(wa.abs, inEvent.Name),
   178  				CleanName: filepath.Join(wa.cleanDir, inEvent.Name),
   179  				Op:        Op(inEvent.Op).String(),
   180  				//Event:     inEvent,
   181  			}
   182  			continue
   183  		case <-wa.ctx.Done(): // shutdown via context
   184  		case <-wa.shutCh: // shutdown via .Shutdown()
   185  			if !wa.isShutdown.IsTrue() {
   186  				wa.errChan <- parl.New("shutdown channel unexpectedly closed")
   187  			}
   188  		} // select
   189  		break
   190  	} // for
   191  }
   192  
   193  func (wa *Watch) shutdown() {
   194  	wa.isShutdown.Set()
   195  	close(wa.shutCh)
   196  	wa.wgThread.Wait()
   197  }
